name: todo-list-api
description: An API that provides a basic Todo function

scripts.test:unit: NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha --reporter spec --opts test/unit/mocha.opts test/unit/**/*_spec.js
scripts.test:integration: NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha -R mocha-lcov-reporter --opts test/integration/mocha.opts test/integration/**/*_spec.js
